I had the same problems but just do theses steps and it works:
1:Download game
2:Unrar using winrar
3:Install the game by mounting the ISO with daemons tools 
4:go here:http://m0004.gamecopyworld.com/games/pc_rock_manager.shtml
Download the crack and unrar

6:Play and think of me XD
